20110113030034.000|20110113030037.000|CC1|ARIZONA SHOOTING HAVE BEEN

20110113030757.000|20110113030758.000|CC1|THINK, ON OCCASIONS LIKE THIS,  
20110113030758.000|20110113030800.000|CC1|THAT ONE OF THE GREATEST

20110113030808.000|20110113030810.000|CC1|LINCOLN AT GETTYSBURG.          
20110113030810.000|20110113030812.000|CC1|IT IS A LONG RICH TRADITION THAT
20110113030812.000|20110113030813.000|CC1|CONTINUED TONIGHT.              
20110113030813.000|20110113030815.000|CC1|THIS POWERFUL NATION OF         
20110113030815.000|20110113030815.000|CC1|IMMIGRANTS REALLY ON THESE

20110113030819.000|20110113030821.000|CC1|>> TOM, FOR EACH OF THOSE       
20110113030821.000|20110113030822.000|CC1|PREVIOUS SPEECHES YOU           
20110113030822.000|20110113030824.000|CC1|REFERENCED, IT SEEMS THAT THE   
20110113030824.000|20110113030825.000|CC1|COUNTRY HAD SOMETHING OF A      
20110113030825.000|20110113030829.000|CC1|RESET, SOMETHING OF AN EMOTIONAL
20110113030829.000|20110113030830.000|CC1|RESET, AND THE AFTERMATH, THE
